issue.title: [Java] Move ArrowBuf into the Arrow package
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8229](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8229). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After ARROW-7505 and ARROW-7935 are done, we are ready to move ArrowBuf into Arrow's package, and make it independent of Netty library.
